title: Christmas: Penhaligon's Scented Treasury of Verse and Prose
description: This book captures all the splendor of Christmas. Included are selections from Christmas favorites such as The Night Before Christmas and A Christmas Carol, as well as time-honored songs such as "Hark the Herald Angels Sing" and "Joy to the World." All of the delights are appropriately gift wrapped in a beautiful holiday package. 45 full-color illustrations.
author: Sheila Pickles
